select.if: select costDate,costItemId, b.itemName costItemName,a.remark,b.itemCode,sum(costPrice) costPrice ,group_concat(a.costPrice SEPARATOR '||') costPriceAll,group_concat(a.remark SEPARATOR '||') remarkAll ,a.costTypeCode,ctype.name costTypeName,ctype.field costTypeField from cost_record a left join cost_item b on a.costItemId = b.id left join cost_type ctype on a.costTypeCode = ctype.code where a.deleteflag=0 and DATE_FORMAT(a.costDate,'%Y-%m') = #{costMonthStr} group by costDate,costItemId,costTypeCode order by costDate desc

select DATE_FORMAT(a.costDate,'%Y-%m') costMonth,costItemId, b.itemName costItemName,a.remark,b.itemCode,sum(costPrice) costPrice ,group_concat(DATE_FORMAT(a.costDate,'%Y-%m-%d') order by a.costDate SEPARATOR '||') costDateAll ,group_concat(a.costPrice order by a.costDate SEPARATOR '||') costPriceAll ,group_concat(a.remark order by a.costDate SEPARATOR '||') remarkAll ,a.costTypeCode,ctype.name costTypeName,ctype.field costTypeField from cost_record a left join cost_item b on a.costItemId = b.id left join cost_type ctype on a.costTypeCode = ctype.code where a.deleteflag=0 and DATE_FORMAT(a.costDate,'%Y') =#{costYearStr} group by DATE_FORMAT(a.costDate,'%Y-%m'),costItemId,costTypeCode order by costDate desc

mapper.select: select date_format(costDate, '%Y-%m') costMonth,sum(costPrice) costPrice from cost_record where deleteFlag=0 group by date_format(costDate, '%Y-%m') order by date_format(costDate, '%Y-%m')
